docs.lead_paragraph: They say college is what you make of it. In Rick Perlstein's view, it certainly was this way back in his day, and more importantly, is not so any more.

headline.main: New York Times Magazine College Essay Contest

docs.abstract: They say college is what you make of it. In Rick Perlstein's view, it certainly was this way back in his day, and more importantly, is not so any more. But to wax nostalgia on an institution that more than any other in America should evolve to society's demands is akin to pining at the [...]

docs.lead_paragraph: Insulated from lawsuits by their corporate structures, private investors in nursing homes have cut expenses and staff, sometimes below minimum requirements.

headline.main: At Many Homes, More Profit and Less Nursing
